item.title: 25th Meeting
item.description: Schedule Schedule: 2025-03-25 (Tue) 2:00 PM - 5:00 PM Location: Korea Digital Certification Association (Yeouido Park One Building Tower 2, 48th floor) - https://maps.app.goo.gl/YnxTkz8LjHPXFJBv6 Agenda Time Agenda Speaker Slide 14:00~14:10 Welcome & Opening - - 14:10~14:30 OpenChain Global Update Shane Coughlan, Linux Foundation - 14:30~14:50 OpenChain Korea Update Haksung Jang, SK Telecom slide 14:50~15:00 Lightning Talk 1 - Open Source Tech Day 2025 Announcement - Jeong-sook Par, ETRI pdf 15:00~15:30 Mobile ID application “DID”, open source governance strategy and future tasks?
